C_Cpp.clang_format_fallbackStyle: { BasedOnStyle: LLVM, UseTab: Never, IndentWidth: 4, TabWidth: 4, BreakBeforeBraces: Attach, BreakConstructorInitializers: BeforeComma, AllowShortIfStatementsOnASingleLine: false, IndentCaseLabels: false, ColumnLimit: 80, AccessModifierOffset: -4, AlignConsecutiveAssignments: true}
